NK036(chi)033:1: // chos kyi rje mtshungs med grags pa rgya mtsho'i rnam
NK036(chi)033:2: thar me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs
NK036(chi)033:3: so // gang zhig dbyings las mi g.yo gdod ma'i mgon //
NK036(chi)033:4: rang byung lha ni kun bzang yab yum dang //
NK036(chi)033:5: rdo rje 'chang sogs brgyud pa'i bla ma la //
NK036(chi)033:6: gsol ba 'debs so byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
NK036(chi)033:7: yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs lhag pa'i lha //
NK036(chi)033:8: mkha' 'gro dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams kyis //
NK036(chi)033:9: dngos grub rnams pa gnyis stsol bar chad sol //
NK036(chi)033:10: bdag nyid dad pa'i yid rab g.yos pa las //
NK036(chi)033:11: dad ldan slob ma'i dang ba 'dren byed du //
NK036(chi)033:12: dpal ldan bla ma'i rnam thar mdor tsam bri //
NK036(chi)033:13: de la nongs pa mchis na bzod mdzad rigs //
NK036(chi)033:14: de la 'dir bdag gi bla ma dam pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug de nyid /
NK036(chi)033:15: dang po yul mchog tu gyur pa rigs rus kyi che bar sku bzhengs tshul /
NK036(chi)033:16: gzhon nu'i tshe nas chos kyi skal ba yod tshul /
NK036(chi)033:17: de'i stobs kyis chos kyi sgor chud tshul /
NK036(chi)033:18: de las mkhas grub kyi bla ma brten tshul /
NK036(chi)033:19: de rnams las dam pa'i chos la thos bsam sgom pa mdzad tshul /
NK036(chi)033:20: de nas grwa bu slob dang sems can spyi la phan pa mdzad tshul /
NK036(chi)033:21: bar chad dang log 'dren btul tshul /
NK036(chi)033:22: yi dam lha'i snang ba thob tshul /
NK036(chi)033:23: bla ma rnams kyis lung bstan thob tshul /
NK036(chi)033:24: tha ma dag pa'i dbyings su gshegs tshul sogs don bcus bstan pa las /
NK036(chi)033:26: yul ni dam chos dar zhing dge bcu la spyod pa'i gnas gra gtso bor grong /
NK036(chi)033:27: yab ni kun dga' 'bum zhes 'brom ston pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas nas brgyud pa'i 'brom gyi rigs /
NK036(chi)033:28: snye mo gzhu kun dga' ra ba ka ba brgyad
NK036(chi)033:29: cu'i bdag po bu re skyes pa dang 'bum tshar
NK036(chi)033:30: re bzhengs / gtsug lag der gdan 'dren /
NK036(chi)033:31: rab gnas bu'i rkang tshugs byed pas /
NK036(chi)033:32: ming la 'bum zhes pa'ang de yin par 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:33: yum ni sangs rgyas rin chen gyi bu mo bsam 'grub 'bum gnyis las /
NK036(chi)033:34: sras ni gsum yod pa las drung pa nyid 'bring por 'khrungs par 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:36: sku na gzhon nu'i dus nas /
NK036(chi)033:37: chos la mos pa dad pa nges 'byung yod pas ser gzugs la dga' ba /
NK036(chi)033:38: ma ni sogs zhal 'don phran tshegs la brtson pa /
NK036(chi)033:39: khyad par yi ge 'bri klog la thugs song nas /
NK036(chi)033:40: slob dpon la gtug rgyu ma byung na'ang /
NK036(chi)033:41: nged rang gi drung pa a khu pha jo la ka kha 'dra bris nas gang shes bslabs /
NK036(chi)033:42: de nas chos shog tshal pa dang yan pa khyer
NK036(chi)033:43: nas las ka'i zhar la bslabs pas brda' 'jol ba
NK036(chi)033:44: byung gsung sa / jo bo che ba hor 'dra byed pa pas yi ge la nan du bslab /
NK036(chi)033:45: bdag gis g.yog gi zhar la bslabs pa ma gtogs ma byung ste /
NK036(chi)033:46: zhar grab pa tsam byung bas /
NK036(chi)033:47: a mas kyang kho bos zhar la byas pas 'di drag pa 'dug zer nas /
NK036(chi)033:49: jo jo la g.yog 'chol ba yang du ma re byas dus /
NK036(chi)033:50: de rnams kyi gzugs kyag kyog bris pas dum pa shes /
NK036(chi)033:51: rting du jo jo yi ge slob par btang nas /
NK036(chi)033:52: bdag gis rtsam pa skyel phyin pas /
NK036(chi)033:54: nga rang gis khyer ba'i rtsam pa ma zad par zhang po las yi ge bslabs /
NK036(chi)033:56: de nas zhang po la rtsam pa skyis sdod bsam pa /
NK036(chi)033:57: a mas 'thab dogs yul la phyin /
NK036(chi)033:58: dpe cha 'bri thub tsam pa'i yi ge 'di de yin gsungs /
NK036(chi)033:60: zhang po la btsun pa gcig byed bsam pa yin byas pas /
NK036(chi)033:62: nga rang yang blo yul du de kha bcangs na'ang /
NK036(chi)033:63: ma skyur ma phod pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:65: jo jo nang sor bsdad pas /
NK036(chi)033:66: mas gang yang mi lcogs par 'dug pas lo gnyis 'gyangs /
NK036(chi)033:67: de nas 'di tsho la zin pa'i dus mi 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:70: yo byad 'dra ba lkog tu mtshon pa bsags /
NK036(chi)033:71: jo jo la gros shig 'debs dgos bsam dol gzhis khar phyin pas /
NK036(chi)033:74: mi shi ba khad zer nas /
NK036(chi)033:75: nga'i phyi la yun ring du byung /
NK036(chi)033:77: gdong du de kha lags byas /
NK036(chi)033:78: khong dang bral nas thag ring du song nas khyod la tig tig med /
NK036(chi)033:79: nga rang btsun pa rang byed bsam /
NK036(chi)033:80: de nas yul du sleb a ma jo jo 'di skad zer /
NK036(chi)033:82: ngas ni chos shig dang 'phrad na rang la dga'
NK036(chi)033:83: zhing khyod la'ang phan thogs pa yong zer ba sogs
NK036(chi)033:84: khe nyen mang du lab kyang nga shi ba khad
NK036(chi)033:85: zer zhing ngu ba yang byed pas /
NK036(chi)033:87: nga 'gro bla ma de ni sangs rgyas dngos yin /
NK036(chi)033:88: khyod rang yang btsun ma byed na sang shog byas /
NK036(chi)033:89: ma dang gnyen gshes la 'dun pa bor ro //
NK036(chi)033:90: tshe 'di la phyi mig la bltas par yong dus /
NK036(chi)033:91: sgor slebs pas nang so drung byang sems bu 'dre dpal ba de /
NK036(chi)033:92: thugs la 'dogs pas rib tsam mjal du 'gro bsam /
NK036(chi)033:94: mi drag a ma nyin mo snying rje gsungs /
NK036(chi)033:96: a ma yang gzhan byas pa ni min chos byas nas snying mi rje zhus pas /
NK036(chi)033:97: 'o na chos mgo thon par gyis /
NK036(chi)033:98: 'di la 'thud kyis gsung snam bu gcig ja sbyor
NK036(chi)033:99: gnyis tsam gcig gos kha gang rnams gnang byung de
NK036(chi)033:101: byams sdings du slebs pa tsam gyis sems la dga' ba dpag tu med pa byung /
NK036(chi)033:102: de dgongs zhang pos snyan zhus phul /
NK036(chi)033:104: nga rang gi lo nyi shu rtsa gsum byi ba
NK036(chi)033:105: lo zla ba yar ngo'i gral tshes bzang po la
NK036(chi)033:106: / mkhan slob sprul sku rin po che dang /
NK036(chi)033:107: 'khrul zhig rin po che rnam gnyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i drung du rab tu byung ste /
NK036(chi)033:108: ming yang mtshan gnyis ka nas sbyar te /
NK036(chi)033:109: grags pa rgya mtsho zhes gnang bas dus de nas
NK036(chi)033:110: 'jig rten la spro ba bcad dam pa chos kyi
NK036(chi)033:112: khyed tsho chos byed pa la gegs med par byas chog pa dga' mo rang yin /
NK036(chi)033:114: nga btsun pa byed pa la dka' ba de tsam byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:115: bzhi pa ltar na rtsa ba'i bla ma mthar thug zhen che zhing /
NK036(chi)033:116: gtsug gi nor bu bzhugs pa rin po che sprul sku ba /
NK036(chi)033:117: 'khrul zhig rin po che bya btang chos rje gu yangs yan pa blo bde /
NK036(chi)033:118: mkhas grub dpal ldan rin chen /
NK036(chi)033:120: mkhas grub pad+ma bzang po rnams yin gsungs /
NK036(chi)033:121: nged rang yang de go rgyun gyi phyag mchod bsdus pa tsam la /
NK036(chi)033:122: de rnams la mdzad pa 'dug pas /
NK036(chi)033:123: gzhan yang chos kyi rje rin po che bsod nams
NK036(chi)033:124: bzang po sogs kyis khrid ma bu tshang bar gnang
NK036(chi)033:125: bas grol ba cher thob pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:126: rtogs ldan rin po che dkon mchog rdo rje la
NK036(chi)033:127: sogs kyis zhen med kyi spyod pas blo sna bsgyur
NK036(chi)033:128: ba dang / chos rje bkras dpal sogs la gsang sngags kyi dbang bka' dang /
NK036(chi)033:129: pha rol phyin pa'i lung sna 'ga' zung gis 'brel
NK036(chi)033:130: ba'i bla ma dam pa mang du yod pa zhabs
NK036(chi)033:131: tog gsum gyis mnyes par byas nas bsten pa yin
NK036(chi)033:132: gsung / zhabs tog gsum la sgrub pa'i zhabs tog
NK036(chi)033:133: nyams len sgom pa mdzad pa'i skabs su 'byung ba
NK036(chi)033:134: gsung / lags / yo byad kyis mnyes pa cher ma byung na'ang /
NK036(chi)033:135: bstan pa rin po che'i zhabs tog bla ma'ii bka'
NK036(chi)033:136: drin gso byed pha ma'i drin lan khel byed nged
NK036(chi)033:137: rang gi dge sbyor gyi bar chad zhi ba'i phyir
NK036(chi)033:138: du / dang po la bsod snyoms byas pa'i nas mtshon pa gcig la brten /
NK036(chi)033:139: byams sdings su khrid chen mo'i tshogs ma bu phyag
NK036(chi)033:140: rten gang 'os dang bcas pa chos rje rin po
NK036(chi)033:141: che zhang dbon pas gtso mdzad /
NK036(chi)033:142: chos zhu phyed dang nyis brgya tsam la zhus /
NK036(chi)033:143: dang po chos zhu ba'i rkang byas gzhan ma'i rgyu
NK036(chi)033:144: cha rkyen gyis lcogs kyang snying gis ma chun pa
NK036(chi)033:146: bdag gis byas pas bla ma mched grogs dang bcas shin tu mnyes mgo legs te /
NK036(chi)033:147: rting du mang du byas chog pa byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:148: rin po che grags don pas gra thang du rgyal
NK036(chi)033:149: ba'i bka' 'gyur ro cog bstan 'gyur dang bcas pa
NK036(chi)033:150: gnang dus chos nyan rnams la tshogs 'khor gcig gnyis
NK036(chi)033:151: dang gzims khang du gdan mang du zhus /
NK036(chi)033:152: drung du na bza' sogs 'bul bas mnyes par byas /
NK036(chi)033:153: de nas dpal sdings su phebs /
NK036(chi)033:154: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang gnang dus dbang zhu rnams la'ang /
NK036(chi)033:155: dbang khral gyi dad bskul mtshon pa bsdus /
NK036(chi)033:156: nged rang gi gzhi gang 'dug blangs dus /
NK036(chi)033:157: dang po 'dzugs ston bzang po gcig byas /
NK036(chi)033:159: thon pa'i nyin tshogs phun sum tshogs pa dang //
NK036(chi)033:160: drung du dbu zhwa na bza' /
NK036(chi)033:161: snam bu 'jam po sogs dgu tshan /
NK036(chi)033:163: sha khog bcu gcig mar dum gcig rnams phul //
NK036(chi)033:164: gangs khrod dgon par gsang rnying gi rgyud 'bum gnyis gnang dus rgyud mchod tshogs 'bul ba sogs zhus /
NK036(chi)033:165: yang de gar rgyud snga phyi bar gsum gyi chos zhus dus kyang 'bul ba tshogs rnams zhus /
NK036(chi)033:166: mdor na chos dbang gdams pa gang dang ci la
NK036(chi)033:167: gang 'tshams kyi 'bul ba dbang ston chos ston grogs
NK036(chi)033:168: mched rnams la tshogs phal cher byas /
NK036(chi)033:169: bya btang byas dus nged rang la byed rgyu med
NK036(chi)033:170: par phan gzan bkal ba yang dum bu byung gsung
NK036(chi)033:171: / gzhan yang dpon po chos dpal dang ngag dbang
NK036(chi)033:172: rnam rgyal spun gnyis kyi bshad gsar sogs la nga
NK036(chi)033:174: rtse thang du mang ja stong mchod 'bul ba sogs lan gnyis dang /
NK036(chi)033:175: gra thang byams gling rnams su tshar 'gyed dang bcas pa re byas /
NK036(chi)033:176: steng du nged rang gi thabs kyang 'gros sgo ches pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:177: skyong dgos kyang mang bas len ma gtogs /
NK036(chi)033:178: chos phyogs la gtong ba'i 'dod chen po yod de dka' mo 'dug gsung /
NK036(chi)033:179: dang po de dus nga rang gi kha min pa
NK036(chi)033:180: skyong dgos med pas pha ma la yang yog mi
NK036(chi)033:181: yong tsam byas / a ma 'das dus ma shi
NK036(chi)033:182: tsam nas dmigs pa dang 'pho ba gang shes yod
NK036(chi)033:183: yong tsam byas / / shi nas de ma thag gsung sgrogs pa bzhag /
NK036(chi)033:184: dkon mchog la mchod pa phul /
NK036(chi)033:185: dgon pa nas gang dgos kyi yo byad blangs /
NK036(chi)033:186: jo jo nye ring gi ma slebs gong du bla ma mchod gnas sogs bzang rags spyan drangs /
NK036(chi)033:187: 'das nas zhag gsum song dus cho ga tshugs zhag lnga sbrel tsam du byas /
NK036(chi)033:188: yul mi dang dgon pa nas dge 'dun rnams la 'gyed mi la mi 'chor ba gcig byas /
NK036(chi)033:189: bdun tshigs zla mchod sogs nga rang gis bzung nas
NK036(chi)033:190: ma chag tsam lo mchod rten bzhengs tshun chad la
NK036(chi)033:191: bcom ldan 'das sman bla'i pho brang dar cha dang
NK036(chi)033:192: tshon gyis ngoms pa 'di bzhengs pa yin /
NK036(chi)033:193: sde pa chen po min pa gzhan gyis 'dras dar cha yang dka' gsung /
NK036(chi)033:194: bla ma rnams gshegs rjes su dus mchod re tsam 'dzin pa /
NK036(chi)033:195: o rgyan gyi tshes bcu re byed pa nged rang
NK036(chi)033:196: gi dgon pa phan tshun du sgrub mchod re gso
NK036(chi)033:197: ba / ma ni ba rnams la tsha ba re 'dren pa sogs gang lcogs kyi dge ba dang /
NK036(chi)033:198: bla ma'i phyogs la gtong bas /
NK036(chi)033:200: nged rang blo bde ba dang 'phral yang skyid par byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:201: bdag gis kyang tsag tsag cug mdzad kyang mdzad pa
NK036(chi)033:202: che ba la gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i thugs shogs
NK036(chi)033:203: che ba gsungs pa bzhin yin par go //
NK036(chi)033:204: lus ngag gi zhabs tog las spyir gyi bla ma'i zhabs tog la dge bcud ma byas /
NK036(chi)033:205: khyad par gang gis gsung pa la gsung bcag pa med /
NK036(chi)033:206: de las kyang byams sdings sogs su nang pa'i 'dren gugs dgongs pa rnams la rgyags pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:207: dang gdos pa'i dpe thub byas /
NK036(chi)033:208: bya btang chos rje'i thugs bzhed la 'tshar gcig bzhed 'dug pas /
NK036(chi)033:209: bsod snyoms byas nas gang des bsgrubs nas 'bul dgos bsam /
NK036(chi)033:210: 'phan yul du btsal bas ma rnyed /
NK036(chi)033:211: byang stag lung du 'gro dgos byung yang dam bca'
NK036(chi)033:212: mthar skyel bsam ste btsal bas rnyed de phul bas
NK036(chi)033:214: bla ma gang mnyes de lag na yod na 'bul /
NK036(chi)033:215: med na btsal nas rin gyis bslu ba dad pa
NK036(chi)033:216: can la 'dug na bskul ba sogs byas pa yin
NK036(chi)033:217: gsung yang rdzong du khrid ka gsung ba la phyag
NK036(chi)033:218: dpe skyid smad du lus nas med gsung pa la
NK036(chi)033:219: / gzhan ma rnams a mdo ba sogs kyis lam la 'jigs nas 'gro zer ba ma byung /
NK036(chi)033:220: chos thugs rjes 'dzin na ngas 'gro zhus pas /
NK036(chi)033:221: de la zla'o gcig dgos gsung /
NK036(chi)033:224: nged gnyis phyin phyag dpe rnams ngas khur khos dar
NK036(chi)033:225: dang sha dang lo chas rtsam pa rnams khur yar
NK036(chi)033:226: yong dus / bye ma klung grong du rta pa bcu dang thug /
NK036(chi)033:227: rgyug pa ring po yod pas rta'i sna gong la brgyab ste gdong blangs /
NK036(chi)033:228: kho 'bros su bcug pas chad nas 'bros pa yang ma byung bar 'gyel nas lus te /
NK036(chi)033:229: dra ba na gang 'dug dang lus chas kyang shor /
NK036(chi)033:230: ngas rta pa gnyis gan rgyal sgyel ri zur de la 'dzegs pas phyag dpe rnams drangs te /
NK036(chi)033:231: drung du lo rgyus zhus pa /
NK036(chi)033:232: gos rnams ngas khur gzhan ma khong la bskur na 'tshengs pa zhus pas /
NK036(chi)033:234: 'di ka go bcad gzhan ma rnams shor kyang nga'i
NK036(chi)033:235: dpe cha ma shor ba legs gsung mnyes pa cher
NK036(chi)033:236: mdzad / de la sogs te bla ma'i gsung byung
NK036(chi)033:237: na phyis kyang mi dor bar phyin pa mang gsung
NK036(chi)033:238: mdzad / / gzhan rten gsum bzhengs pa /
NK036(chi)033:241: zhang stengs sogs kyi mchod rten zhig gsos byed pa
NK036(chi)033:242: la lus kyis gang lcogs 'bungs pas sgrib pa dag
NK036(chi)033:243: pa'i rtags re tsam byung ba yod gsung /
NK036(chi)033:244: ngas ni gang gsung bsgrubs pa las /
NK036(chi)033:245: bla ma'i bka' gcog ma myong khyed tshos bla ma'i bka' bcag na skyid po mi yong gsung /
NK036(chi)033:246: lnga pa ltar na bla ma rnams las gdams ngag thob tshul gsan yig ltar lags /
NK036(chi)033:247: nyid kyis thos bsam la sbyangs pa mdzad tshul ni /
NK036(chi)033:248: nga rgan zhugs lta bu yin pas 'dzin yangs rgyu med /
NK036(chi)033:249: dang po rdzogs chen gyi gtor ma chos spyod gsol 'debs /
NK036(chi)033:250: bla ma'i las byang chos skyong bskang gso /
NK036(chi)033:251: zhi khro'i bsgom khog don phrin /
NK036(chi)033:252: bskang bshags rnams nyin nub kha sbyar te bzung nas bslabs /
NK036(chi)033:254: theg gsum gsal byed rnams blo la chu rgyug pa 'dra byas /
NK036(chi)033:255: don yang gang shes go bar bslabs /
NK036(chi)033:258: mchod gar la sogs cha lag tshang ba dang /
NK036(chi)033:259: tshe dpag med grub rgyal ma /
NK036(chi)033:261: kun rig gzhan phan 'od zer cha lag dang bcas /
NK036(chi)033:262: rgyud sde lnga'i sgrub mchod byed lugs rgyas pa /
NK036(chi)033:263: bde mchog lu hi pa rnams kha yod lag yod tsam du bslabs pa yin gsung /
NK036(chi)033:264: gzhan yang sman lha kam ka ni sogs za chos dang /
NK036(chi)033:265: smyung gnas chos skyong skor lag len dang /
NK036(chi)033:266: mdo phran tshegs sman dpyad skor phan bya dang /
NK036(chi)033:267: sgra'i mtshams sbyor dum gcig sogs gang shes 'dzin la khyer kha med na'ang /
NK036(chi)033:268: sgyid lug ma byas par dka' ba spyad de bslabs /
NK036(chi)033:270: slob gnyer byed pa la rtsam pa skyel mkhan dang
NK036(chi)033:271: gegs med par byas chog pa rnams 'bung rgyu yin
NK036(chi)033:272: / nga 'dra ba shi nas dgon khog 'di tsho 'dzin pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:273: mi'i sna ngos bstun bstun gyis mi 'ong gsungs pas bdag la ji ltar gsung gsungs pa bzhin byung /
NK036(chi)033:274: da nyams len mdzad tshul ni khyed bsgom byed 'dod na 'di 'dra bas mi yong /
NK036(chi)033:275: nged tsho dang po chos la blo song tsa na
NK036(chi)033:276: spyir gyis chos sgor zhugs nas dgon pa dang ma
NK036(chi)033:277: bral tsam du byas dus gal te klungs su phyin
NK036(chi)033:278: na'ang / khyim pa'i nang du mi 'gro bar zhag
NK036(chi)033:279: re tsam lus na'ang cog pu sogs 'gol bar sdod
NK036(chi)033:280: na'ang / pa / khyad par byams sdings /
NK036(chi)033:284: dpal sdings kyi sangs rgyas sgom khong /
NK036(chi)033:286: chos lung gi brag phug zhar ma /
NK036(chi)033:289: ri bo bde chen la sogs te bla ma gong
NK036(chi)033:290: ma'i sgrub gnas dang ri bran rnams su gos bem
NK036(chi)033:291: dug dang / khyi thul re dang /
NK036(chi)033:292: ras rkyang byas dus ras la brten /
NK036(chi)033:298: dka' thub bcud len ma byas dus /
NK036(chi)033:299: rgyags la sris sri yags byas nas mu khang 'dag 'byar /
NK036(chi)033:300: ri mi 'bebs thab spangs la sogs mang du byas pa yin /
NK036(chi)033:301: chos byed pa la ltos gos la gyong re tsam 'gel dgos pa yin /
NK036(chi)033:302: khyed tshos dka' thub sogs ci'ang /
NK036(chi)033:303: chos nyan pa'i dus 'dir de ring gi gro'i rkyen
NK036(chi)033:304: mi theg par chos thun che tsam byung na nga
NK036(chi)033:306: de la byang kha ba 'di tsho thabs rdugs par 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:308: gang gi bzhin dgos pa yin gsung /
NK036(chi)033:309: nga dang po nas dka' thub sogs byed pa la
NK036(chi)033:310: blo 'gro bas gzhan gyis byed kyi zer ba la
NK036(chi)033:312: grogs mched gcig bdud rtsi ril bu byed zer ba thos pas nga rang yang za dgos /
NK036(chi)033:313: de ring rang tshod gcig lta bsam nas nged rang
NK036(chi)033:314: gi dri ma gcig btang nas de la g.yam pa'i
NK036(chi)033:315: thur ma btsug khyur mid byas pas /
NK036(chi)033:316: 'di las sman sogs sbyar bas bzhin te zhim bsam spro ba skyes gsung /
NK036(chi)033:317: rting du bcud len sogs kyi lung thob nas /
NK036(chi)033:318: zhu lar rgyud phyi'i bsnyen par byed pa'i ril bu byas zas gzhan gyi 'khri ba bcad nas /
NK036(chi)033:320: rting du zla ba bzhi byas pas shin tu 'jam par byung /
NK036(chi)033:321: byams sdings su dbyar zla ba drug thab spangs byas /
NK036(chi)033:322: rtsam khal phyed dang gnyis la brten nas /
NK036(chi)033:324: yang byams sdings su lo mtshams gcig gi khongs su /
NK036(chi)033:325: rgyud sde lnga'i sgrub mchod bsnyen pa byas pas bar
NK036(chi)033:326: chad kyi snang ba dum gcig byung ba bskyed rim
NK036(chi)033:327: dang lta bas zin te dge sbyor gyi grogs su
NK036(chi)033:328: song ba byung bas dge sbyor 'phel bar byung gsung
NK036(chi)033:329: / de la sogs te byams sdings su snga phyi
NK036(chi)033:330: dril bas lo bzhi lnga tsam mtshams byas bsdad pas
NK036(chi)033:332: tshal min ri khrod du mun khang byas dus rtogs
NK036(chi)033:333: ldan chos dpal dang lhan cig tu phyi sgo gcig
NK036(chi)033:334: / nang sgo tha dad du yod pas khong nyams
NK036(chi)033:335: gcig 'ur bas des rkyen byas nged rang yang 'ur
NK036(chi)033:336: bas rdo chung chig brtsegs byas pa'i bla ma g.yel
NK036(chi)033:337: de'i rtsig khar rgyug pas rdo brul /
NK036(chi)033:338: nged rang gnyis ma 'gyel bas mi rnams kyis ya mtshan tsam byas /
NK036(chi)033:339: gzhan yang sbyor drug gi rtags legs po rang byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:340: dpal ldan sdings su a khu bkras dpal gyis gong
NK036(chi)033:341: gis phug der dbyar gcig zla ba gsum zan skam
NK036(chi)033:342: rkyal chung gang la brten nas lcang lhab la zan
NK036(chi)033:343: skam rdog po dang por bdun ma btab /
NK036(chi)033:344: de nas snga ma de la zhag re byas bsdad pas nyams rtogs kyi shul dum pa byung /
NK036(chi)033:345: yid kyang stong pa 'dra bas dbyar ni lo ma dang zan skams 'dis chog /
NK036(chi)033:346: dgun ni 'bru ma ril bu sogs byas chog /
NK036(chi)033:348: bsod snyoms sogs lto gos kyi 'dun ma mi byed par /
NK036(chi)033:349: dge sbyor kho nas dus 'das pa byed bsam byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:350: brag phug zhar mi shar der ras pa bsam she dang nged grogs mched gnyis kyi bsdad /
NK036(chi)033:351: 'bru chan byas nas bre gsum la zla ba gsum
NK036(chi)033:352: thub pa'i rtsis byas pas khong bcud len zla ba
NK036(chi)033:353: gcig bsdad / ngas chan thur ma re 'gams pas chan phor pa gang gis rgyags lhag yang byung /
NK036(chi)033:354: dge sbyor yang 'phel ba rang gcig byung /
NK036(chi)033:355: nged gnyis kyi brag skyibs chung bas /
NK036(chi)033:356: shing thog skal ba la thigs pa byung ba la len du phyin /
NK036(chi)033:357: khong gi 'dug sa la yang yod tshad 'dug phad
NK036(chi)033:358: chung gcig sas bkang khyer te shod de nas thod
NK036(chi)033:360: khyed rang gi chos yong ba 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:361: nga 'dras mi yong ba 'dug gsung byung /
NK036(chi)033:362: chos rje dkon rdor ba la ras chung snyan brgyud dang /
NK036(chi)033:363: gtum mo gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas ras rkyang zhus /
NK036(chi)033:364: ri bor lo sar zla ba'i grang sgang la kha
NK036(chi)033:365: nas lud pa 'dor dus nam mkha' la khyags te
NK036(chi)033:366: / sa la 'thor 'gro ba'i dus der nged grogs mched gsum bzhi zhig gis ras 'bud byas /
NK036(chi)033:367: nged gnyis drag pa byung ste /
NK036(chi)033:368: drod kyis ras thub pa byung bas rtsa bzang gsung chos rje yang mnyes pa tsam byung /
NK036(chi)033:369: de nas bzung ste 'khrul 'khor gyi khrigs /
NK036(chi)033:371: lus sngar dang yang mi 'dra bar yang bas sogs yon tan du ma byung /
NK036(chi)033:372: rting du chos drug gi phyi nang gsang ba 'khrul 'khor nyi shu /
NK036(chi)033:373: lam 'bras kyi phrin las sum cu rtsa gnyis /
NK036(chi)033:374: sba bzhi 'chi med 'khrul 'khor sogs ma chags par byas pas /
NK036(chi)033:375: bog cher 'phel bas yid ches te byed spro bar byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:376: spangs po sdings nas chos rje pa stod lung du /
NK036(chi)033:377: bla ma gcig gi chos zhur gdan 'dren byung bas chos bka' mang du zhu sgros su 'dug pas /
NK036(chi)033:378: phyags phyir bdag kyang 'khrid par zhus pas chos la tshud de /
NK036(chi)033:379: gzhi pa la gzan pas basngada pa 'thad gsung /
NK036(chi)033:380: chos la tshud la gzhi pa'i chu de 'thung dgos pa 'dra /
NK036(chi)033:381: gzhan thigs ma gcig mi za bar dam bca' 'bul /
NK036(chi)033:382: nged rang la gser 'dab gcig kyang yod /
NK036(chi)033:383: bdud rtsi ril bu rkyal chung gang yang yod /
NK036(chi)033:384: khar song nas kyang ril bu byas pa /
NK036(chi)033:385: 'di gnyis zad nas gtor cha ting shags kyang yod /
NK036(chi)033:387: 'o na gzhan mas mig ltos longs khyer rang sngon la song la nga'i sgug sdod kyis gsung /
NK036(chi)033:388: gzhan mas ma tshor tsam byas phyin nas /
NK036(chi)033:389: lam la chu skor 'drar tsam bslangs pas /
NK036(chi)033:390: nas khal phyed dang gnyis tshod cig byung /
NK036(chi)033:391: de la gzhi ma byas ril bu yang dum pa zos gser de yang nad pa des nyos /
NK036(chi)033:393: chos thob che ba yang byung /
NK036(chi)033:394: ril bu za ba gzhan gyi tshor bas bkres mthong
NK036(chi)033:395: gi dum pa ster ba yang byung bas rgyags kyang
NK036(chi)033:397: chos zhu ba la yang rgyags sogs ma thogs khyer rgyu'am /
NK036(chi)033:398: lto gos la gyong thub pa dka' ba der 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:399: ngas ni lto gos sogs yod na khyer med na
NK036(chi)033:400: gang byung la brten lo nyi shu rtsa gsum nas
NK036(chi)033:401: bzhi bcu zhe gsum par dpal ldan sdings kyi dgon
NK036(chi)033:402: pa ma byung ring sprang po rgyal khams pa byas
NK036(chi)033:403: / bla ma rnams dang mjal thub tshad mjal /
NK036(chi)033:404: gdams ngag zhu thub tshad zhus /
NK036(chi)033:405: nyams su blangs pa de sgom thub tshad bsgoms /
NK036(chi)033:406: mdor na lto gang byung gos ras rkyang /
NK036(chi)033:407: de min khyi thul la brten pas bla ma rnams thugs la 'dogs pa /
NK036(chi)033:409: grogs mched rnams dang mthun pa /
NK036(chi)033:410: drag zhan nye ring su la'ang bstun mi dgos pa /
NK036(chi)033:411: gang du bsdad kyang chags sdang mi dgos pas /
NK036(chi)033:412: dge sbyor 'phel ba skyid pa rang byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:413: dpal ldan sdings kyi bla ma 'di byas nas byed
NK036(chi)033:414: dka' ru songs nas dpon po sogs drag zhan gyi
NK036(chi)033:415: sems 'dzin / grwa pa dmu rgod kyi log sgrub /
NK036(chi)033:416: grogs po mnyam mnyam gyis mtho gnon /
NK036(chi)033:417: sha tsha g.yog byed kyi sna ngur /
NK036(chi)033:418: yon bdag pho mo'i byon gshegs /
NK036(chi)033:419: yul mi ngan pa rnams kyis 'tshe ba sogs ma skyid pa'i mgo dod pa 'dras byung /
NK036(chi)033:420: chos sogs zhu ba yang bla ma'i ming 'dra ba
NK036(chi)033:421: des mi re dgu che bas dka' ba tsam byung
NK036(chi)033:422: ste / bla ma tshur dgon par gdan 'dren pa /
NK036(chi)033:423: phar nged rang 'gro ba sogs stabs gang 'grigs byas nas /
NK036(chi)033:424: grwa bu slob dang yon bdag pho mo rnams la yang phan pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:425: zhar la tshangs par byas pa yin gsung /
NK036(chi)033:426: khyed rang tshang la gang yod 'di tshang mar zhus na des chog pa yod /
NK036(chi)033:427: ngas khong pa 'di chos kyis tshil nag brkyangs pa bzhin byas nas yod pa yin te /
NK036(chi)033:429: de nas bla ma'i ming gog byas nas gzhan la zhu ba la rgyu cha rkyen mang du dgos /
NK036(chi)033:430: dpon slob kyi rten 'brel 'dzom pa yang dka' bas /
NK036(chi)033:431: de las 'dir byas chog pa ni brod pa yin pas /
NK036(chi)033:432: da lta zhu na dga' gsung /
NK036(chi)033:433: khyed rang tsho ro nyal nyal rang mi byed par
NK036(chi)033:434: tho rengs bla ma rnal 'byor gsol 'deebs re yang
NK036(chi)033:435: byed / yi dam gyi lha gcig kyang gtso bor bzung ste bsnyen pa byed /
NK036(chi)033:436: chos skyong gcig la gtor ma ma chag tsam re byed dgos pa yin /
NK036(chi)033:437: nged ni tho rengs bla ma dam pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor spyi 'dus re sgom /
NK036(chi)033:438: rdzogs pa chen po'i lam zab bla ma'i gsol 'debs /
NK036(chi)033:439: bi ma la'i gsol 'debs sku bzhi'i gsol 'debs pho nya myur mgyogs //
NK036(chi)033:440: rang gi blos byas pa'i gsol 'debs /
NK036(chi)033:441: brgyud pa gang nas brgyud pa'i chos de 'chad dus dang /
NK036(chi)033:442: sgom dus de'i gsol 'debs ma chags tsam byas pas /
NK036(chi)033:443: bla ma rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
NK036(chi)033:444: lus sems bde ba dang chos re tsam bshad kyang bar chad nyung tsam byung /
NK036(chi)033:445: slob ma yang sgom pa rnams la blo yul du babs nas phan pa yang dum pa byung bas /
NK036(chi)033:446: bla ma la gsol ba 'debs pa'i yon tan yin bsam pa yod gsung /
NK036(chi)033:447: dang po gu ru drag sgrub /
NK036(chi)033:448: phyag na rdo rje a tsar+ya /
NK036(chi)033:450: rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa /
NK036(chi)033:451: rta mgrin lcags ral can la sogs pa drag po'i lha mang du bsgrubs pas rtags thon pa byung /
NK036(chi)033:452: rgyal po la sogs gnod pa la drag sgrub 'di basngagasa par 'dug pas /
NK036(chi)033:453: da lta bskrad pa sogs byed pa ni de yin gsung /
NK036(chi)033:454: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i dbang dang lung rnams thob
NK036(chi)033:455: nas grangs bsnyen de nas zhag re bzhin yi ge
NK036(chi)033:458: tshe dpag med grub rgyal ma la khri tsho re /
NK036(chi)033:459: lha dgu'i snying po dang yang snying la khri tsho re /
NK036(chi)033:460: gzungs gang lcogs re de bar bsgrangs pas byin rlabs zhugs pa 'dra yang byung /
NK036(chi)033:461: khyad par du pho lo bdun cu la zin 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:462: bar du nad drag po gnyis gsum byung ste rkyen
NK036(chi)033:463: byas nas mi shi bar bsdad chog pa yi dam
NK036(chi)033:464: rnams kyi thugs rje yin gsung /
NK036(chi)033:465: chos skyong yang dam can sde lnga la bskang gsol dang /
NK036(chi)033:466: rgyun gtor byas pas rang la yang 'khor ba dang /
NK036(chi)033:467: chos 'a chad dus longs spyod re tsam 'du ba'i yon tan dang /
NK036(chi)033:468: gnod pa re tsam byung na ma 'bad kyang rtags re yo nga ba 'dra 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:469: gaza'i sgo nas nad pa'i gtor ma re tsam byas pas phan par byung /
NK036(chi)033:470: khyod rang yang 'di'i tshig brgyud ma 'di nyon ster ba yin gsung /
NK036(chi)033:471: ni gu dang 'brel nas mgon po phyag drug pa
NK036(chi)033:472: 'khor bcas la gtor ma dang bsnyen pa yang dum
NK036(chi)033:473: re byas pas bar chad re tsam sel ba'i rnam
NK036(chi)033:474: pa dang / rmi lam du yang snang ba thob pa'i rnam pa byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:475: dgon gog 'dzin pa dang chos re tsam 'chad slob ma re tsam pa'i mi yin na /
NK036(chi)033:476: chos skyong rnams la gtor ma re byed pa ni dgos byed chen po'i rigs su 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:477: mthu rang mi byed kyang lcags ri dang /
NK036(chi)033:478: chos 'chad dus ye shes pa rnams gtor mas mnyes
NK036(chi)033:479: par byas pas bar chad sel ba a cang che
NK036(chi)033:480: ste / de rnams kyi 'khor gyi 'jig rten pa
NK036(chi)033:481: tsho ma mgu na'ang bar chad byed pa gcig yin
NK036(chi)033:482: ste / par 'dug / nga dpal sdings su lo
NK036(chi)033:483: gnyis gsum du byas pas khrid pa yang mang du
NK036(chi)033:484: ste / par 'dug / byung / de'i nang nas
NK036(chi)033:485: mun khang la nan tan byas pas mtshams byed pa
NK036(chi)033:487: than thun byung ba yang mang du byung bas phan
NK036(chi)033:489: lo steng gcig byas pas khrid pa mang po byung /
NK036(chi)033:490: nyin gcig grags pa dpal ldan la jo nang bstan
NK036(chi)033:491: ma yin zer ba gcig babs pa 'dra 'dug pas
NK036(chi)033:492: / khyod kyis song la gtor ma la ched gnyer
NK036(chi)033:493: ma byas ngas 'bungs pa yin zer bas nged rang
NK036(chi)033:494: gis kyang ched gnyer yang che chung byas /
NK036(chi)033:495: kha la nga khyod 'dras ma 'bungs kyang ma 'bungs byas pas /
NK036(chi)033:496: de ga yin nga 'gro khyod kyis gyis zer bas /
NK036(chi)033:497: de'i ras legs po byung na'ang steng du sbyor drug
NK036(chi)033:498: ye mtshugs par lo mang po song rjes byas pas
NK036(chi)033:500: des na khyed tsho yang chos re tsam 'chad pa
NK036(chi)033:501: byung na gtor ma la nan tan re tsam dgos
NK036(chi)033:502: pa 'dug gsung / drug pa lta na nged rang
NK036(chi)033:503: gis bzungs pa'i dgon pa bzhi pa'i grwa pa bgres
NK036(chi)033:504: gzhon gcong can nyams chung yang gtso bor chos kyis
NK036(chi)033:505: bskyangs te khrid kha re tsam tshugs par byas /
NK036(chi)033:506: lung phran dbang sogs gang dgos kyi sgo nas phan sems ma dor bar byas pa yin gsung /
NK036(chi)033:507: gzhan yang chos kyi phan pa sna re tsam byas /
NK036(chi)033:508: sman dang sman dpyad gang shes 'dis nad pa sogs la gang phan byas /
NK036(chi)033:509: mdor na tshe 'das gcig gi cho ga dbang bskur
NK036(chi)033:510: la phyin kyang 'di ngas cis kyang 'drongs par byed
NK036(chi)033:511: pa'i bsam pas phyed pa yin /
NK036(chi)033:512: de 'dra'i don byed pa la bsam pa de ci na'ang gtso che ba yin rigs su 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:513: pha jo phur bkras 'das nas bdun tshigs kyi chos
NK036(chi)033:514: mtshon pa gcig shul ma rnams kyi bskyal khyed rang
NK036(chi)033:516: khyod kyis 'bungs zer bas de tsug byed byas /
NK036(chi)033:517: rgyud sde lnga'i sgrub mchod btsugs 'dun pa drag po byas pas /
NK036(chi)033:518: rmi lam la pha jo mi gzhan cig gi zla
NK036(chi)033:519: la mun nag yod pa'i mtha' 'dra zhig la song
NK036(chi)033:520: bas / ngas ri rtse cig la khrid bde ba can gyi lam bstan pas /
NK036(chi)033:521: de phyogs la 'phur snyam byed pa zhig byung /
NK036(chi)033:522: gzhan yang blo bzang po 'ga' re la byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:523: mdor na bstan pa a cang che /
NK036(chi)033:524: gzhan la mi dang grog sbur yan la zan kham bu re sogs kyis phan na bsam pa byas /
NK036(chi)033:525: nged rang sangs rgyas sgrub pa la sdig pa yang chung ngus gnod /
NK036(chi)033:526: dge ba yang chung ngus phan pa yin /
NK036(chi)033:527: khyed rang tsho yang phor pa gang gi steng nas kyang phud kyis dkon mchog mchod /
NK036(chi)033:528: lhag de nas khyi zan bcangs pa re byed dgos pa yin gsungs /
NK036(chi)033:529: bdun pa ltar na gzugs can gzugs med kyi lha
NK036(chi)033:530: 'dre glo bur gyi lha 'dre sogs kyis cher ma
NK036(chi)033:531: tshugs / bya btang byas dus lam dgra dang jag pa byung ba mang ste /
NK036(chi)033:532: dgra byed pa tshur byung ste phar gzan bkal ba rkyang yin /
NK036(chi)033:533: dgon pa rnams bzung nas nyam chung la gnod pa re tsam dang /
NK036(chi)033:534: rkun ma re tsam byung ba rnams mthu gtad ngan pa ma byas kyang /
NK036(chi)033:535: thabs gang mkhas kyi sgo nas btul bas /
NK036(chi)033:536: phar zhu rang 'bud mi dgos pa 'di yin gsung /
NK036(chi)033:537: ngan pa rang byas pa gcig la gtor ma sogs
NK036(chi)033:538: ma byas kyang chos skyong rnams kyis shags 'byed re
NK036(chi)033:539: tsam byung ba 'ga' re byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:540: byams sdings su rgyud sde lnga'i bsnyen pa bya dus
NK036(chi)033:541: spyil po de'i sgo de mtho bor 'dug ste nang
NK036(chi)033:542: btsun pa 'dra ba'i gdong mchu dmar zhing ras kyam
NK036(chi)033:543: dang zhwa thebs gyon pa'i gzugs nam mkha' la snyegs
NK036(chi)033:544: pa gcig gnyid la song ba'i rmi lam du 'dug
NK036(chi)033:545: pas / dang po skrag dngangs kyang byung /
NK036(chi)033:546: de nas drag sgrub kyi bskyed rim 'khos che ba tsam du byas /
NK036(chi)033:547: rmi lam de yang zin byung bas bden med kyi lta bas kyang zin /
NK036(chi)033:548: gnyid sad dus nang de 'od gsal du mer re 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:549: de kha'i ngang du bzhag pas phyi snang ba thams
NK036(chi)033:550: cad kyang 'od gsal du song bsam pa'i nyams pa'i
NK036(chi)033:552: bden med kyi tshig mang po kha nas 'don /
NK036(chi)033:553: lus gar thabs su byed pa'i yun ring du 'khrab pa zhig byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:554: dpal sdings su mtshams gcig kyang byas /
NK036(chi)033:555: dpe cha 'dra bzhengs byed kyi gzims khang du dbyar
NK036(chi)033:556: gcig der bsdad tsa na thog smad dgu nged rang
NK036(chi)033:557: nyal yod pa'i thog gong ma de nged rang gi
NK036(chi)033:559: nyal ba'i steng gi thog de nas 'dom do tsam
NK036(chi)033:560: 'khyog 'dug pas bab dus yug gcig brgyal 'dug de
NK036(chi)033:561: nas gzhob dri dang me dri chen po 'dug song
NK036(chi)033:562: de'i khang pa de'i bzhi thog phug /
NK036(chi)033:563: mdzo mo gcig dang ba chung gcig shi nga rang
NK036(chi)033:564: la cang ma byung bas rting du 'jigs pa tsam
NK036(chi)033:565: gyis dkon mchog gi thugs rje yin par go //
NK036(chi)033:566: de nas gnang gzhes tsam la bu 'dren 'dzam zer
NK036(chi)033:567: ba gcig yang kha na yod pa de la o
NK036(chi)033:568: rgyan gyi mchod gnas rgya mtsho 'bebs kyi yod pas
NK036(chi)033:569: mo bab nas / dgon pa'i slob dpon ya ki
NK036(chi)033:570: dang lha 'dre rnams 'khrug pas slob dpon rgyal zer
NK036(chi)033:571: mo bab nas / ba byung gsung / sding po
NK036(chi)033:572: cher khrid gcig btsugs pas khrid kyi sgang rang la
NK036(chi)033:573: song dus gdan la bzhugs pa la skrang 'bur gcig
NK036(chi)033:574: byung nas zug chen po rang byas sdod pa la'ang
NK036(chi)033:575: chos thun gyi tsher zug tshad byung bas /
NK036(chi)033:576: sgrub pa mo g.yu gang ma na yod pas /
NK036(chi)033:577: nged na zer ba lab lab mang du byed pas /
NK036(chi)033:578: rgya skad mang po lab byed pas /
NK036(chi)033:579: khyod gang nas yin ci na byas pas /
NK036(chi)033:580: rgya gar nas yin rdo rje gdan du tshogs 'khor la 'gro dgos pa yod /
NK036(chi)033:581: nga 'gro zer nga la shug ste byas nas gcig
NK036(chi)033:582: pu na zer nas 'di la ci phan byas pas
NK036(chi)033:583: / dam tshig gi sel dum tsam pa gcig gis len pa yin /
NK036(chi)033:584: da chos nyan 'di tsho la yams rims gcig yong ba yod /
NK036(chi)033:586: chos shod phrin las 'dra byed zer ba byung gsungs /
NK036(chi)033:587: yang sdings po che'i gzims khang de nas klu bdud
NK036(chi)033:588: gcig 'dug pas 'khor dang phyugs la gnod pa dum
NK036(chi)033:589: re byas byung nub gcig rmi lam na nyal ba'i
NK036(chi)033:590: steng gi gdung gseb de na sdig pa rtsig bu
NK036(chi)033:591: che shos tsam gcig 'dug pas rmi lam de zin
NK036(chi)033:592: byung ba dang / phag rgod mdzo tsam gcig tu
NK036(chi)033:593: sprul nas khyur mid byas pas rmi lam 'tshub pa
NK036(chi)033:594: dang gnod pa rnams chad byung /
NK036(chi)033:595: gzhan yang de 'dra'i rigs mang du gsung pa rnams
NK036(chi)033:596: dran pa ra ri tsam las mi gsal bar 'dug
NK036(chi)033:598: byams sdings su mun khang dang thab spangs dbyar gcig byas /
NK036(chi)033:599: de thon rting lus thams cad sprid pa byung /
NK036(chi)033:600: mig dmar por song rtsa chur yang 'gyur byung bas /
NK036(chi)033:601: brtag pa byas dus mdze rang du shes byung /
NK036(chi)033:602: da de yang na rgyal khams la phyin rgyus med
NK036(chi)033:603: kyi yul du lam zan la brten nas 'di thon
NK036(chi)033:604: na rab / ma thon kyang dge sbyor gang nus
NK036(chi)033:605: byed yang na ni mi med pa'i ri khrod cig
NK036(chi)033:607: da nged rang mi khrod du mi tshud par 'dug bsam byung ba las /
NK036(chi)033:608: snga sor 'di khar mtshams zhig bgyis dang bsam /
NK036(chi)033:609: phyag rdor u tsar+ya'i bsnyen pa yang dum re byas /
NK036(chi)033:610: rdzas chen rnams pags byug byas pas /
NK036(chi)033:611: byug pa byas kyis lod du rang song byung /
NK036(chi)033:612: da 'di 'dra srog la rgol bar 'dug bsam nas
NK036(chi)033:613: thal thul dang cher med gang yod rnams kyi mtho
NK036(chi)033:614: rtse gcig zhang po la bcol /
NK036(chi)033:615: nga shi 'dug zer nas 'di tsho thong zer ba byas /
NK036(chi)033:616: lus ngag khyer rgyal khams la phyin /
NK036(chi)033:617: lha rje'i gral skor gcig byas nas 'chos shes pa yong ba yang srid /
NK036(chi)033:618: klu sogs kyi gnod pa yin na /
NK036(chi)033:619: gnyan sa gang 'dug tu gcod re tsam byas na thon pa yang srid bsam /
NK036(chi)033:620: gal te ma thon kyang dge sbyor gang 'phel byed /
NK036(chi)033:621: shi yang la kha'i bya ro dang chu kha'i nya
NK036(chi)033:622: ro byed bsam phyin pas lha rje la ci yin
NK036(chi)033:625: la la gang yin zer ba las /
NK036(chi)033:627: dol gyi lcogs phug pas things te /
NK036(chi)033:628: sa'i bam lus la rgyug pa yin /
NK036(chi)033:629: mdze rang min mdze rtags tsam yin pas /
NK036(chi)033:630: drag gzer ba yin gsung pas /
NK036(chi)033:631: nged rang gi yid yul dang mthun par byung /
NK036(chi)033:632: sa'i bam yin pa yang thab spangs byas dus sogs
NK036(chi)033:633: sne'i 'og de rul 'dug pas de go khong gi
NK036(chi)033:634: byug pa mang po yang bslab /
NK036(chi)033:635: nged rang gis kyang drod bcos skor gyi byug pa byas /
NK036(chi)033:636: rlung dang 'phrul 'khor mang du byas pas zla ba
NK036(chi)033:637: gcig nas skyed cher byung ste thon pa yin gsung
NK036(chi)033:638: / sding po cher bla ma gad 'or pas dug gcig byung ba las /
NK036(chi)033:639: ma byung gong du rmi lam dang mo ma sogs kyi dug yod zer ba la /
NK036(chi)033:640: nged rang rtog pa rtsings pas /
NK036(chi)033:641: khos zho gcig la phye gcig btab nas byin pas /
NK036(chi)033:642: pha rol la 'gro rtsis grab byas /
NK036(chi)033:643: gang yod la spang thag dang /
NK036(chi)033:644: dpal ldan ldings kyi tshad khang 'di yang bzhengs /
NK036(chi)033:645: mi rnams phal cher la nga 'chi byas /
NK036(chi)033:646: khong rnams na re 'chi ba rang mi 'od dug
NK036(chi)033:647: yin na e'i chu tshan phan zer bas 'gro dgos
NK036(chi)033:649: rmi lam la yang phyin na bsam pa gcig byung
NK036(chi)033:650: ba phyin pas nyes med du 'khor de nas chu
NK036(chi)033:651: tshan gyi yon tan dang dkon mchog gi thugs rje
NK036(chi)033:652: las nad kyang skyed cher byung /
NK036(chi)033:653: 'chi rtsis rang la ma shi tsam byung steng du dpal sdings su ske dang /
NK036(chi)033:654: khyad par lce kha'i nang du mi shongs tshad byas /
NK036(chi)033:655: lab kyang ye mi shes pa gcig byung bas /
NK036(chi)033:656: gzhan ma dang nged rang byings kyis 'chi bar gzung /
NK036(chi)033:657: lha rjes kyang thog der srin bya'i skad byung ba thos 'dug pa dang bcas pas /
NK036(chi)033:658: lha rjes kha gtam de byas /
NK036(chi)033:659: da dkon mchog min pa re sa med bsam ste /
NK036(chi)033:660: bla ma dkon mchog shi ba legs sam /
NK036(chi)033:661: ma shi ba legs gang legs pa thugs rjes zung
NK036(chi)033:662: thugs rjes skyob pa'i dus su 'dug bsam nas gsol
NK036(chi)033:664: nam mkha' nas sgra byung ste dbang bzhi bskur ba rnams rim pa bzhin du /
NK036(chi)033:665: dang po nyid dag pa gzhi'i dbang /
NK036(chi)033:666: gnyis pa ye shes rgyun mi chad pa'i dbang /
NK036(chi)033:667: gsum pa 'khor lo bde ba chen po'i dbang /
NK036(chi)033:668: bzhi pa dag pa ye shes kyi dbang zer ba byung /
NK036(chi)033:669: de'i go ba len gyin dbang gcig blangs /
NK036(chi)033:670: de nas yug gcig song ba na /
NK036(chi)033:672: skyes bu'i tshe lo brgyad cu yin //
NK036(chi)033:674: de nas yug gcig song ba dang /
NK036(chi)033:675: bstan pa chags pa drug stong sum brgya yin //
NK036(chi)033:676: gnas pa 'jig pa'ang drug stong brgya re yin //
NK036(chi)033:677: zer ba yang byung bas yid nyams sos byung //
NK036(chi)033:678: byams sdings su thog 'og tu tshud /
NK036(chi)033:679: yang kha'i gru'ang bying la khad pa yang kha nas dgon par phyi phyi gcig 'ong bas /
NK036(chi)033:681: gad pa rta zhon mdung bzung gyi tshod gcig la brul /
NK036(chi)033:682: yug gcig brgyal dran pa byung ba dang nyams gcig
NK036(chi)033:683: lhan gcig byung 'dug pas de'i ngang la dgon par
NK036(chi)033:684: 'khyol 'dug / de nas nyams de sad tsa na tshug tsam mi yong bar 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:685: de la sogs te rkyen drag po mang pos nged
NK036(chi)033:686: rang yang 'chi bar thag bcad pa mang po byung
NK036(chi)033:687: ste / da tshun bla ma dkon mchog gi thugs rjes legs po rang byung lags te /
NK036(chi)033:688: de nas khos gcig skyel gsung /
NK036(chi)033:689: da lta'i mi 'di tsho na yang mi 'chi gzhan
NK036(chi)033:690: 'chi ba 'dug pa mthong yang nged rang mi 'chi
NK036(chi)033:691: bsam pa'i mi rigs mang po 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:692: khyed rnams la bar thar yang e yong ngam /
NK036(chi)033:693: da yang de 'dra'i grabs re tsam dgos pa yin gsung /
NK036(chi)033:694: brgyad pa ltar na sku na chung ngu'i dus su ma ni re tsam bgrangs pas /
NK036(chi)033:695: brag 'bru gu gshongs kyi brag phug cig na thugs
NK036(chi)033:696: rjee chen po'i sku ngo mtshar can cig 'dug pa
NK036(chi)033:697: la phyag dang mchod pa byas pas /
NK036(chi)033:698: byin gyis rlabs pa byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:699: ral gri gong du 'u lag skyel phyin /
NK036(chi)033:700: g.yul khang nang 'dra zhig tu bsdad /
NK036(chi)033:701: o rgyan gyi rtags bstod cig shes pa mang du
NK036(chi)033:702: byas pas rmi lam du gu ru'i sku gcig nam
NK036(chi)033:703: mkha' de la bzhugs 'dug pa la /
NK036(chi)033:704: gsol ba btab pas 'od zer gyi rnam pa nged rang la tshur byung nas /
NK036(chi)033:705: de nas nam mkha' la je mthor song mi mthong
NK036(chi)033:706: ba tsam du yal ba rmis chu bo rir tshe
NK036(chi)033:709: srin po ri'i gtsug lag khang mthong byung bas /
NK036(chi)033:710: bcom ldan 'das la dad pa gcig cher skyes /
NK036(chi)033:711: bdag bskyed mdun bskyed dang yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:712: kha nas gang shes kyi mchod pa dang bstod pa byas pas /
NK036(chi)033:713: de dgongs gangs dkar zhol du bsdad pas /
NK036(chi)033:714: rmi lam du srin po'i ri ngos la phyin pas /
NK036(chi)033:715: gtsang po thon pa'i gling mkha'i dkyil du sleb tsa na /
NK036(chi)033:716: bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig pa rin po che
NK036(chi)033:717: dang rus pas brgyan pa sku mdog nam mkha' ltar
NK036(chi)033:718: dwangs pa gcig dang mjal byung bas phyag dang skor
NK036(chi)033:719: ba mang du byas pas zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun
NK036(chi)033:720: byung ba 'thung bas lus sems bde bas khyab pa
NK036(chi)033:721: rigs kyi bu zhes lan gsum byon pas gsung gi
NK036(chi)033:722: snang ba dang bcas pa byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:723: dpal sding dgon rtser phyag drug pa'i las byang gtor
NK036(chi)033:724: chog rgyas bsdus ran pa zhig byed dgos bsam pa
NK036(chi)033:725: yod pas dgong gcig rmi lam du ye shes mgon
NK036(chi)033:726: po'i sku shin tu che ba zhig byon /
NK036(chi)033:727: las byang byed bsam na gyis gsung pa byung bas /
NK036(chi)033:728: de nas byas chog par go nas byas pa yin gsung /
NK036(chi)033:730: byis pa'i dus su yang kha'i rgyal sgo gdong du phyin pas /
NK036(chi)033:733: chang dang za ma nor phran tshegs ldang la slong gsung /
NK036(chi)033:734: med zhus pas 'di na 'dug gzhan lugs 'di bzhin 'dug rdzun ma zer gsung /
NK036(chi)033:735: gang yod things pa'i mngon shes can cig byung bas /
NK036(chi)033:736: nga gzigs 'phral du chos kyi skal pa bzang po yod /
NK036(chi)033:737: chos gyis gsung ba byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:738: 'khrul zhig rin po che la gdams ngag re tsam zhu dus byed dgos /
NK036(chi)033:739: khyed kyis 'gro don re tsam yong bar 'dug pas gsung /
NK036(chi)033:740: nged rang gi mgron po dang ci yong zhus pas /
NK036(chi)033:741: de ring song tsa na yong ba yin blo ma lad pa gyis la 'bungs gsung /
NK036(chi)033:742: gcig brgyud kyi dbang rjes gnang sogs /
NK036(chi)033:743: nye gnas dang mi gzhan sku mdun na med du shog gsung mang du gnang gsung /
NK036(chi)033:744: bya btang chos rjes gcig gnang ba'i rjes la ma
NK036(chi)033:745: ni brgya rtsa re bskul ba phyag len du mdzad
NK036(chi)033:746: pa / bdag la bla ma ras pa khyod dpal
NK036(chi)033:747: sdings su chos 'chad tsa na ma ni 'di bskul
NK036(chi)033:748: pa / gsungs pa dang / gzhan yang khyod rang
NK036(chi)033:749: yang dgon pa 'dzin tsa na 'dug gyis gsung mang
NK036(chi)033:750: pa / gsungs pa dang / du gsungs pas /
NK036(chi)033:751: nga 'dras dgon pa dang ci zin bsam pa las
NK036(chi)033:752: pa / gsungs pa dang / du gsungs pas /
NK036(chi)033:753: / steng du dgon pa 'dzin lo chos 'chad lo
NK036(chi)033:755: drung pa nyid la mngon mkhyen gcig mnga' bar go gsung /
NK036(chi)033:756: chos kyi rjes ma ni 'di khyed tshos kyang chos dang 'chad pa byung na gyis gsung /
NK036(chi)033:759: nga rgan po da lo song res kyi mi gsungs pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:760: chos bzhin zhu na da lta zhus pa drag /
NK036(chi)033:761: de nas ded kun e sdod mi shes gsung /
NK036(chi)033:762: nga shi na yang khyed rang spun gnyis 'di zung /
NK036(chi)033:763: spyad pa 'di tsho khyed rang tsho bdag rgyu yin /
NK036(chi)033:764: 'di tsho rjes la gtong rgyu yin zer ba sogs mang du byon /
NK036(chi)033:765: nyin gcig glo bur du nged ming sring rnams la
NK036(chi)033:766: 'di 'dra ba dag rgyu yin gyi yi ge re
NK036(chi)033:767: mdzad nas 'di rnams khyed tshos gyis /
NK036(chi)033:768: gzhan ma gang 'dug nga rang gi rjes la thong gsung /
NK036(chi)033:769: ngas phyogs gcig nas slebs dus yi ge rnams ston mdzad pa las /
NK036(chi)033:770: blo dang ma bde bya ba ni med bsam pa gcig byung /
NK036(chi)033:771: de nas chos lung du dgun bi ma la'i khrid gnang ba las /
NK036(chi)033:772: gnangs gzhes tsam thon rgyu'i do dgong der dzam b+ha la'i pha'i cho ga la theg pas /
NK036(chi)033:773: kho dam nyams der song bas /
NK036(chi)033:774: de'i skyon gyis de dgong der shin tu bsnyung ste de khar 'grong 'dra bsam pa las /
NK036(chi)033:775: ma grongs tsam la sang de dgon par phebs pa'i dgong mo de /
NK036(chi)033:776: khro bo ri ri ti'i phyag rgya gyis /
NK036(chi)033:777: bgegs bsrung ba yin gsung ba zhig byung gsung /
NK036(chi)033:779: mgon po tshe dpag med sku mdog dkar po gcig
NK036(chi)033:780: byon da lo la mi 'chi tsam yong ba 'dra
NK036(chi)033:781: gsung / de res de gsol ba mi thebs la khad pa las /
NK036(chi)033:782: bdag sogs la thugs rjes gzigs nas sku khams kyang dwangs /
NK036(chi)033:783: da zhag kyang yang chos lung du de'i dgun mkha' 'gro snying thig btsugs bar tshad kyang med /
NK036(chi)033:784: bka' lung snying thig ma gnyis kyi lhag lus 'dra yod pa rnams kyang rdzogs par gnang /
NK036(chi)033:785: khyad par bka' sdod rjes gnang bod lung rnams thugs
NK036(chi)033:786: rjes bzung nas 'di tsho khyed spun la 'phrod pas
NK036(chi)033:787: blo bde gsung / bka' lung yang bzang po gnang /
NK036(chi)033:788: de nas dpyid kha de chos lung nas sku khams mgo ma an tsam mnyel nas /
NK036(chi)033:789: dpal sdings su phebs nas kyang mnyel ba zla ba gnyis tsam byung /
NK036(chi)033:790: de nas bdag gis sleb nas mnyel ba zla ba gcig lhag tsam gyi ring la /
NK036(chi)033:791: lus tshags kyang 'grol rgyu med par bsnyung g.yog zhabs tog byas pas bsnyung zug chung ba'i bar la /
NK036(chi)033:792: khrid 'di 'chad pa la 'di gyis gsungs pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:793: khyad par rdzogs chen chos brgyud yin pas /
NK036(chi)033:794: gzhan tshos snying thig ma gnyis mkho ba yong bas 'di bzhin byed rgyu yin sogs mang du gnang /
NK036(chi)033:795: de nas spyir gyi grwa bu slob dang /
NK036(chi)033:796: sgos nged rang spun dang bcas pa'i bsod des ma zin pa'i rnam pas mi bzhugs par rigs pas /
NK036(chi)033:797: klungs la 'tshol 'tshol 'dra byed pa la phyin /
NK036(chi)033:798: de dgongs slebs rtsis ma sleb pas /
NK036(chi)033:799: blo dang ni ma bde don ma chod pa byas pas ni ma byung /
NK036(chi)033:800: de'i dgongs mo der gnyid cher ni ma byung /
NK036(chi)033:801: tho rangs rig pa gcig byung dus /
NK036(chi)033:802: khyod rang ga le gyis drung ba lags /
NK036(chi)033:803: sgug nas bzhugs yod zer bas sems mi 'tshab tsam byung /
NK036(chi)033:804: de nas de'i dgongs mo 'phyi 'phyi gcig yar yong
NK036(chi)033:805: dus ma sleb gong du jo jo gsung pa mang
NK036(chi)033:806: du byon / kho sleb ma byung ngam gsung pa
NK036(chi)033:807: byung 'dug de sleb dus ci 'dra byung zhes shod
NK036(chi)033:808: du dris pas ma thegs tsam byung zer bas yid
NK036(chi)033:810: sku mdun du sleb pas jo jo gsung pas lags zhus pas slebs pa dga' gsung /
NK036(chi)033:811: de nas cang mi gsung bar snyung zug kyang chung du song bas thugs dam la bzhugs te /
NK036(chi)033:812: yos lo zla ba lnga pa'i tshes bcu dgu'i tho
NK036(chi)033:813: rangs gdul bya dag pa'i dbyings su gshegs pa las
NK036(chi)033:814: / da nged 'dra ba'i mi'i bsod nams kyi skal pa thams cad dus 'dir nub song bsam ste /
NK036(chi)033:815: yid pham kyang cher skyes mchi ma sogs mang du byung ste /
NK036(chi)033:817: zhang po blo rgyal gnyis la rib pa byas nas ma byung ba tsug byas /
NK036(chi)033:818: yid kyi sgo nas gsol ba 'debs pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:819: smon lam mang du byas pa rnams zin pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:820: nam yang langs byung nas tshad pa yang tsha bas /
NK036(chi)033:821: sku gdung de bzhugs lugs byas /
NK036(chi)033:822: tsan dan ga bur gyis byugs bdag gis byang khar phyin pas /
NK036(chi)033:823: grab yul sogs kyi bsam blo dang blo gting nas
NK036(chi)033:824: kyang ma bde bas ma mthong bar 'dug sbyin pa
NK036(chi)033:825: sogs kyi ltas pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i gzhi ma
NK036(chi)033:826: dwangs pa la / 'ja' sna lnga dang 'ja' dkar gyis khengs 'dug zer de ltar gshegs na'ang /
NK036(chi)033:827: thugs dgongs rdzogs thabs rnams bsgrubs pa la lag na 'don rgyu yang cher mi 'dug /
NK036(chi)033:829: sbyin pa yang stabs ma bde ba 'dras byas /
NK036(chi)033:830: nged rang la yang mi'i khyer kha cher med pa'i steng du /
NK036(chi)033:831: mi gcig lag gcig tu song byung na'ang /
NK036(chi)033:832: drung pa nyid kyi thugs rje la brten nas /
NK036(chi)033:833: mi la ngo mi tsha tsam 'grub byung /
NK036(chi)033:834: lo dus su sku gdung de bzhu bas rten sogs ma byon kyang /
NK036(chi)033:835: gdung lcags chod mang du byon /
NK036(chi)033:836: de kha dang mtshungs par nang rten tshe dpag med
NK036(chi)033:837: gcig bzhengs pas srog shing rang lugs su yod pa
NK036(chi)033:838: dang / mar me 'dzin pa sogs byon rting du byang chub chen po'i sku 'bum bzhengs dus /
NK036(chi)033:839: yo byad sogs 'bad med byung ste /
NK036(chi)033:840: rab gnas kyang shin tu legs te mthong ba'i yul
NK036(chi)033:841: phyogs kyang lo legs pa'i dge mtshan kyang yod pa
NK036(chi)033:842: dang / dpal ldan sdings rang du yang byin rlabs che ba dang /
NK036(chi)033:843: bkra shis pa'i rtags mang du byung /
NK036(chi)033:844: khyad par bre'i nang na dbu thod ril por byon
NK036(chi)033:845: pa de rin po ches bkang nas yod pa'i de'i
NK036(chi)033:846: yon tan gyis dpal ldan sdings pa rnams yar 'phel
NK036(chi)033:847: rang la song byung ba thugs rje yin par 'dug
NK036(chi)033:848: / de la sogs te tshad med pa'i thugs rje
NK036(chi)033:849: dang yon tan mnga' ba'i dpal ldan bla ma dam
NK036(chi)033:850: pa de nyid dag pa'i zhing khams gang du bzhugs
NK036(chi)033:851: / kyang / spyir sems can thams cad dang khyad
NK036(chi)033:852: par nged rang la gsol ba 'debs pa'i bu slob
NK036(chi)033:853: rnams thugs rjes mi 'dor bar go ste /
NK036(chi)033:854: bdag gis phyag rgya chen po'i chos de 'chad lo byas dus /
NK036(chi)033:856: nga rang 'chad pa'i tshig sgros gcig la blo things
NK036(chi)033:857: pa las de dgongs de rmi lam du byon te
NK036(chi)033:858: / 'di yin gsungs pa dang gzhan yang dgon pa phan tshun du legs nyes re tsam yod na /
NK036(chi)033:859: legs pa la dgyes pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:860: nyes pa la mi dgyes pa sogs rmi lam du yong ba 'dras 'dug pas /
NK036(chi)033:861: des na gsol ba btab na thugs rjes 'bral med du gzigs par 'dug pas /
NK036(chi)033:862: mos gus ltem kyang med pa'i sgo nas /
NK036(chi)033:863: gsol ba rtse gcig tu 'debs pa dang /
NK036(chi)033:864: gong du bkod pa'i che ba yon tan gyi rnam
NK036(chi)033:865: par thar pa rnams la yid ches shing sna re
NK036(chi)033:866: tsam las ma byung yang phyag len la thebs par
NK036(chi)033:868: 'dir yang gsung ba rnams phal cher chos gnang dus gsung ba dang /
NK036(chi)033:869: dpon slob 'bral dus gsung ba dang /
NK036(chi)033:870: skabs gzhan du yang dam dum gsung ba rnams bdag gi dran pa la bzung bar bgyis te /
NK036(chi)033:871: gsung ji lta ba bzhin la rang bzo'i legs legs
NK036(chi)033:872: 'dra'i lhan pa sogs kyis ma bslad par byas shing
NK036(chi)033:873: / dad can rnams dang ba 'dren byed dang /
NK036(chi)033:874: bdag nyid kyang bla ma dam pa rjes su dran pa'i yid gso ba'i phyir dang /
NK036(chi)033:875: brgyud pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams la rnam thar re mdzad par 'dug pas /
NK036(chi)033:876: 'dir yang 'di lta bu zhig dgos par go nas bgyis pa lags pas /
NK036(chi)033:877: mos gus can rnams bla ma'i phyag len la yid ches par bya ba'i phyir gzigs par zhu zhing /
NK036(chi)033:878: skabs gzhan du sgrib pa'i sa bon bsog pas dad pa tsam med pa la sba bar rigs so //
NK036(chi)033:879: de las bla ma'i rnam par thar pa la mos pa can rnams dang ba 'dren pa'i gsung /
NK036(chi)033:880: me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba /
NK036(chi)033:881: mtshan ldan bla ma'i gdung 'dzin sh+aakya'i dge slong ngag
NK036(chi)033:882: dbang rnam rgyal bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos
NK036(chi)033:883: / stag gi lo zla ba brgyad pa'i tshes nyer
NK036(chi)033:884: gcig gi skar ma mgo'i nyin dga' ldan byams pa
NK036(chi)033:885: sdings kyi chos rje rin po che'i gzim khang dam
NK036(chi)033:886: par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni blo dang ldan
NK036(chi)033:887: pa'i 'jam dpal blo gros kyis so //
NK036(chi)033:888: 'dis kyang bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams
NK036(chi)033:889: cad sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas pa nyid du
NK036(chi)033:890: shes te / phyam gcig par bla ma'i drin las ji lta bar rtogs pa nyid du gyur cig /
NK036(chi)033:891: bla ma'i rnam thar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las //
NK036(chi)033:892: gang gsung cha shas rdzogs pa'i 'od zer te //
NK036(chi)033:893: bdag blo'i mkha' la shar te bkod pa las //
NK036(chi)033:894: dad ldan kun da'i tshal rnams dgyes par mdzod //
NK036(chi)033:895: de las byung ba'i dge ba rgya mtsho las //
NK036(chi)033:896: 'gro kun bung ba chos kyis tshim byas nas //
NK036(chi)033:897: mthar yang bla ma'i go 'phang bsgrod par shog /
NK036(chi)033:898: gzhan yang skye zhing skye ba thams cad du //
NK036(chi)033:899: dam pas ma bzhin brtse bas rjes bzung ste //
NK036(chi)033:900: gang gsung sgrub byed thugs kyi bu gcig bu //
NK036(chi)033:901: dam chos nu zho ngoms pa nyid gyur cig /
NK036(chi)033:902: dge ba dang bde skyid ldan pa'i bkra shis phun
NK036(chi)033:903: sum tshogs pa mnga' bas phyogs kun tu khyab par
